texto: 4.11 Timeliness Dispute resolution should be delivered as expeditiously as feasible given the nature of the dispute and of the process used (see Annex H). 4 . 1.2 C o n fi d e n ti a l i ty Personally identifiable in formation should be kept confidential and protected, unless disclosure is required by law or consent for disclosure is obtained from the person concerned. Similarly, trade secrets should be kept confidential and protected, unless disclosure is required by law or consent for disclosure is obtained from the party that has the trade secret. NOTE 1 Personally identifiable in formation is in formation that when associated with an individual can be used to identify him or her, and is
